item.title: Norton I, Emperor of the United States and Protector of Mexico
item.dc:creator: George Leslie-Waksman
item.description: That the United States, at one time, had an Emperor has recently come to my attention. I find it rather interesting that history books tend to neglect the reign of Emperor Norton I when recounting American History. The more I read about this man, the more exceptional he is, truly a great American and a patriot. I can honestly say, with great conviction that Emperor Norton I is one of my personal heroes.
